description:
Features such rare illustrations as limited-edition illustrations for magazines and shop special bonuses.

Note: This application is in English.

Included as a special bonus with the purchase of “Atelier Firis: The Alchemist and the Mysterious Journey DX”.
name: Atelier Firis: The Alchemist and the Mysterious Journey DX Digital Art Book
intro: A new "Digital Art Book" featuring illustrations and music from "Atelier Firis" of the Mysterious series!
ratingContent: Mild violence, alcohol references, sexualised imagery and coarse language
